name: BeyondGrip Technology Solutions
tag_list: beyondgrip, software-consulting, hipaa-consulting-services, outsourcing, offshoring, it-companies-in-chennai
overview:
BeyondGrip Technology Solutions is an IT Consulting Firm specializing in business solutions utilizing Enterprise Business Solutions, BI, Web 2.0, SOA, Open Source, Mobile application development and many more.

With more than 400+ customers and thousands of IT projects in Mobile, Open source, Web 2.0, and SOA under our belt, BeyondGrip enables large and SME companies alike to leverage our one-of-a kind workforce of elite IT experts to create revenue generating business solutions.

BeyondGrip has established strong footholds in fields of Offshore Dedicated Development Center, Application Development & Maintenance, Software as a Service, Enterprise Solutions, Product Development & Support, Game Development Mobile Solutions, Business Process Outsourcing, Testing Services, Multimedia Services and Search Engine Optimization.

The Core Service offerings are:

1) Application, Product Development & Maintenance.

2) Enterprise Business Solutions (SAP, CRM, Oracle, PeopleSoft etc).

3) Business Intelligence & Analytics (Datawarehousing, Datamart, Data Integration etc).

4) Mobile Applications (iPhone, Android, Blackberry, Symbian etc.)

5) Web 2.0 Implementation & Consulting.

6) Web designing & Maintenance.

7) Opensource Consulting & Implementation.

8) SOA and Web Services.

9) Technical & Product support.

10) SEO, Link exchange, Link building etc.

11) Data entry, Form filling etc.

12) Gaming, Digital media services etc.

13) QA & Testing Services
